name: Escape The Abyss (Taeby)
description:
Escape The Abyss is the beginning of a horror-survival mystery game. The player takes the role of scientist James Wilter who lives temporarily in the underwater station MIRA. He works for the international marine exploration and his mission is to investigate a newly discovered species which is potentially dangerous for humanity. The player can look around the station, look into the diary of James, his sketches and research results to find out more about the backstory and his experience down there. 

This was a university project focused on leaning the game engine Unity.  Therefore a lot of Assets were free downloads from several websites and creators. Please contact me for credit or more information about specific assets!
